src_original: cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñāne na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  cakṣurvijñānaṃ śrotravijñāne na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  śrotravijñānaṃ śrotravijñāne na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  śrotravijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñāne na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  cakṣurvijñānaṃ śrotravijñānañ ca ghrāṇavijñāne na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 無眼界，無眼界施設可得；

src_original: ghrāṇavijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānaśrotravijñānayo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  cakṣurvijñānaśrotravijñānaghrāṇavijñānāni jihvāvijñāne na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,  jihvāvijñānaṃ jihvāvijñāne na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  jihvāvijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānaśrotravijñānaghrāṇavijñāneṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  cakṣurvijñānaśrotravijñānaghrāṇavijñānajihvāvijñānāni kāyavijñāne na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
tgt_original: 無色界、眼識界及眼觸、眼觸為緣所生諸受，無色界乃至眼觸為緣所生諸受施設可得；

src_original: kāyavijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānaśrotravijñānaghrāṇavijñānajihvāvijñāneṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  cakṣurvijñānaśrotravijñānaghrāṇavijñānajihvāvijñānakāyavijñānāni manovijñāne na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,  manovijñānaṃ manovijñāne na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  manovijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānaśrotravijñānaghrāṇavijñānajihvāvijñānakāyavijñāneṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.  cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 無耳界，無耳界施設可得，無聲界、耳識界及耳觸、耳觸為緣所生諸受，無聲界乃至耳觸為緣所生諸受施設可得；

src_original: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  śrotrasaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  ghrāṇasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  ghrāṇasaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaśrotrasaṃsparśayo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 無鼻界，無鼻界施設可得，無香界、鼻識界及鼻觸、鼻觸為緣所生諸受，無香界乃至鼻觸為緣所生諸受施設可得；

src_original: jihvāsaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  jihvāsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaśrotrasaṃsparśaghrāṇasaṃsparśajihvāsaṃsparśeṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  kāyasaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  kāyasaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaśrotrasaṃsparśaghrāṇasaṃsparsajihvāsaṃsparśeṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaśrotrasaṃsparśaghrāṇasaṃsparśajihvāsaṃsparśakāyasaṃsparśā manaḥsaṃsparśe na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,  manaḥsaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 無舌界，無舌界施設可得，無味界、舌識界及舌觸、舌觸為緣所生諸受，無味界乃至舌觸為緣所生諸受施設可得；

src_original: manaḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaśrotrasaṃsparśaghrāṇasaṃsparśajihvāsaṃsparśakāyasaṃsparśeṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.  cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāvedanā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāvedanāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāvedanā śrotrasaṃsparśajāvedanāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  śrotrasaṃsparśajāvedanā śrotrasaṃsparśajāvedanāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  śrotrasaṃsparśajāvedanā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāvedanāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 無身界，無身界施設可得，無觸界、身識界及身觸、身觸為緣所生諸受，無觸界乃至身觸為緣所生諸受施設可得；

src_original: kāyasaṃsparśajāvedanā kāyasaṃsparśajāvedanāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  kāyasaṃsparśajāvedanā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāvedanāśrotrasaṃsparśajāvedanāghrāṇasaṃsparśajāvedanājihvāsaṃsparśajāvedanāsu (ŚsP_II-1_77)  cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāvedanāśrotrasaṃsparśajāvedanāghrāṇasaṃsparśajāvedanājihvāsaṃsparśajāvedanākāyasaṃsparśajāvedanā manaḥsaṃsparśajāvedanāyāṃ na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,  manaḥsaṃsparśajāvedanā manaḥsaṃsparśajāvedanāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  manaḥsaṃsparśajāvedanā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajāvedanāśrotrasaṃsparśajāvedanāghrāṇasaṃsparśajāvedanājihvāsaṃsparśajāvedanākāyasaṃsarśajāvedanāsu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.  pṛthivīdhātu pṛthivīdhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 無法界、意識界及意觸、意觸為緣所生諸受，無法界乃至意觸為緣所生諸受施設可得；

src_original: pṛthivīdhātur abdhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  abdhātur abdhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  abdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  pṛthivīdhātur abdhātuś ca tejodhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  tejodhātuḥ tejodhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 無地界，無地界施設可得；

src_original: tejodhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātāv abdhātau ca na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  pṛthivīdhātur abdhātuḥ tejodhātur vāyudhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  vāyudhātur vāyudhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  vāyudhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātvabdhātutejodhātuṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  pṛthivīdhātur abdhātutejodhātuvāyudhātur ākāśadhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  ākāśadhātur ākāśadhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 無水、火、風、空、識界，無水、火、風、空、識界施設可得；

src_original: ākāśadhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātvabdhātutejodhātuvāyudhātuṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  pṛthivīdhātur abdhātutejodhātuvāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vā vijñānadhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  vijñānadhātur vijñānadhātau na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  vijñānadhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātvabdhātutejodhātuvāyudhātvākāśadhātuṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.  avidyā avidyāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  avidyā saṃskāreṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 無無明，無無明施設可得；

src_original: iti hy abdhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?  tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
tgt_original: 是地界清淨與水界清淨，無二、無二分、無別、無斷故。

src_original: tasmād yo 'bdhātor vyayo na so 'bdhātuḥ,  yo bhagavaṃs tejodhātor vyayo na sa tejodhātuḥ,
tgt_original: 水界清淨故火界清淨，火界清淨故水界清淨。

src_original: iti hi tejodhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,  tat kasya hetoḥ?  tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
tgt_original: 何以故？ 是水界清淨與火界清淨，無二、無二分、無別、無斷故。

src_original: tasmād yaḥ tejodhātor vyayo na sa tejodhātuḥ,  yo bhagavan vāyudhātor vyayo na sa vāyudhātuḥ,
tgt_original: 火界清淨故風界清淨，風界清淨故火界清淨。

src_original: iti hi vāyudhātuś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?  tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
tgt_original: 何以故？ 是火界清淨與風界清淨，無二、無二分、無別、無斷故。

src_original: tasmād yo vāyudhātor vyayo na so vāyudhātuḥ,
tgt_original: 風界清淨故空界清淨，空界清淨故風界清淨。 何以故？

src_original: tasmād yaḥ ṣaḍāyatanasya vyayo na tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,  yo bhagavan sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,
tgt_original: 六處清淨故觸清淨，觸清淨故六處清淨。

src_original: iti hi sparśaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?  tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
tgt_original: 何以故？ 是六處清淨與觸清淨，無二、無二分、無別、無斷故。

src_original: tasmād yaḥ sparśasya vyayo na sa sparśaḥ,  yo bhagavan vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,
tgt_original: 觸清淨故受清淨，受清淨故觸清淨。

src_original: iti hi vedanā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?  tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
tgt_original: 何以故？ 是觸清淨與受清淨，無二、無二分、無別、無斷故。

src_original: tasmād yo vedanāyā vyayo na sā vedanā,  yo bhagavan tṛṣṇāyā vyayo na sā tṛṣṇā,
tgt_original: 受清淨故愛清淨，愛清淨故受清淨。

src_original: iti hi tṛṣṇā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?  tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
tgt_original: 何以故？ 是受清淨與愛清淨，無二、無二分、無別、無斷故。

src_original: tasmād yaḥ tṛṣṇāyā vyayo na sā tṛṣṇā,  yo bhagavan upādānasya vyayo na tad upādānam,
tgt_original: 愛清淨故取清淨，取清淨故愛清淨。

src_original: iti hy upādānaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?  tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
tgt_original: 何以故？ 是愛清淨與取清淨，無二、無二分、無別、無斷故。

src_original: iti hi bhavaś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?  tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
tgt_original: 何以故？ 是取清淨與有清淨，無二、無二分、無別、無斷故。

src_original: iti hi jātiś ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?  tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
tgt_original: 何以故？ 是有清淨與生清淨，無二、無二分、無別、無斷故。

src_original: tasmād yo jāter vyayo na sā jātiḥ,  yo bhagavan jarāmaraṇasya vyayo na taj jarāmaraṇam, iti hi (ŚsP_II-1_190)
tgt_original: 生清淨故老死愁歎苦憂惱清淨，老死愁歎苦憂惱清淨故生清淨。

src_original: jarāmaraṇaṃ ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?  tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
tgt_original: 何以故？ 是生清淨與老死愁歎苦憂惱清淨，無二、無二分、無別、無斷故。

src_original: tasmād yo jarāmaraṇasya vyayo na taj jarāmaraṇam.  yo bhagavan dānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dānapāramitā,  iti hi dānapāramitā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ,
tgt_original: 老死愁歎苦憂惱清淨故布施波羅蜜多清淨，布施波羅蜜多清淨故老死愁歎苦憂惱清淨。

src_original: tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
tgt_original: 是老死愁歎苦憂惱清淨與布施波羅蜜多清淨，無二、無二分、無別、無斷故。

src_original: tasmād yo dānapāramitāyā vyayo na sā dānapāramitā,  yo bhagavan śīlapāramitāyā vyayo na sā śīlapāramitā,
tgt_original: 「布施波羅蜜多清淨故淨戒波羅蜜多清淨，淨戒波羅蜜多清淨故布施波羅蜜多清淨。

src_original: iti hi śīlapāramitā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?  tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
tgt_original: 何以故？ 是布施波羅蜜多清淨與淨戒波羅蜜多清淨，無二、無二分、無別、無斷故。

src_original: iti hi kṣāntipāramitā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?  tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
tgt_original: 何以故？ 是淨戒波羅蜜多清淨與安忍波羅蜜多清淨，無二、無二分、無別、無斷故。

src_original: iti hi vīryapāramitā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?  tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
tgt_original: 何以故？ 是安忍波羅蜜多清淨與精進波羅蜜多清淨，無二、無二分、無別、無斷故。

src_original: iti hi dhyānapāramitā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?  tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
tgt_original: 何以故？ 是精進波羅蜜多清淨與靜慮波羅蜜多清淨，無二、無二分、無別、無斷故。

src_original: iti hi prajñāpāramitā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?  tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
tgt_original: 何以故？ 是靜慮波羅蜜多清淨與般若波羅蜜多清淨，無二、無二分、無別、無斷故。

src_original: iti hy adhyātmaśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?  tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak,
tgt_original: 何以故？ 是般若波羅蜜多清淨與內空清淨，無二、無二分、無別、無斷故。

src_original: tasmād yo 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyā vyayo na sādhyātmaśūnyatā,  yo bhagavan bahirdhāśūnyatāyā vyayo na sā bahirdhāśūnyatā,
tgt_original: 「內空清淨故外空清淨，外空清淨故內空清淨。

src_original: iti hi bahirdhāśūnyatā ca vyayaś cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. tat kasya hetoḥ?  tathā hi bhagavan na vyaya eko na dvau na bahavo na pṛthak, (ŚsP_II-1_191)
tgt_original: 何以故？ 是內空清淨與外空清淨，無二、無二分、無別、無斷故。
